LanguageData.PsilocapHigh.label: psilocap hallucinations
LanguageData.PsilocapHigh.description: Chemicals from psilocap spores, possibly inhaled from the air, are causing this person to experience subtle hallucinations that distort their perception of reality.
LanguageData.PsilocapHigh.stages.minor.label: minor
LanguageData.PsilocapHigh.stages.moderate.label: moderate
LanguageData.PsilocapHigh.stages.extreme.label: extreme
LanguageData.PsilocapTolerance.label: psilocap tolerance
LanguageData.PsilocapTolerance.description: An acquired tolerance to psilocap. The more severe this tolerance is, the more psilocap it takes to get the same effect.
LanguageData.PsilocapTolerance.stages.small.label: small
LanguageData.PsilocapTolerance.stages.large.label: large
LanguageData.PsilocapTolerance.stages.massive.label: massive
